Articles.Content:
i have not been playing the game for long and I\'m majorly addicted!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The most i have acomplished is putting a 13 staged SBR into orbit and do a dry landing on kerbin

Whenever a try and get to the Mun i either go too high , low or just overshoot by 2Million metres. i have about 3 different clusters of debris orbiting the sun though

i would love some tips and pointers

thanx blossm13 :) 8)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Mince

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

(Really Mince, you need to come up with something original.)

thanx guys

i just crashed into the moon (i say crashedbecause my rocket kinda de assembled itself) oh and i found a spot on the moon that wanst solid ???

Welcome to the forums!

Get into orbit around Kerbin with an HDR (or how it\'s called...) of 90 degrees. Than, raise the highest apsis to 11400km. Wait till the moon intercepts you. Go to the apsis and than remove horizontal velocity. Fall down and try to land .

I like your style. Ramming the moon is fun.

welcome to the forum
yer thanks but rammed? i went through it!

(Really Mince, you need to come up with something original.)

We\'re copying each other now? Cool...

Anyway...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky Nooblet

KSP Community Manager

yer thanks but rammed? i went through it!

I did that once. I was trying to time warp closer but misjudged, went directly through the moon and the game crashed.
